akn:subsection.akn:heading: Separate affiliate required for competitive activities

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Separate affiliate required for competitive activities
(b) Structural and transactional requirements The separate affiliate required by this section—
(c) Nondiscrimination safeguards In its dealings with its affiliate described in subsection (a), a Bell operating company—
(e) Fulfillment of certain requests A Bell operating company and an affiliate that is subject to the requirements of section 251(c) of this title—

(h) Transition With respect to any activity in which a Bell operating company is engaged on February 8, 1996, such company shall have one year from February 8, 1996, to comply with the requirements of this section.
